text.p: Stone & Webster Inc on Thursday its board has elected H. Kerner Smith as board chairman effective immediately.
Smith will continue as president and chief executive, two positions he has held since joining the company in February 1996, the company said.
Smith replaces Kent Hansen, who held the chairmanship since August 1995. Hansen was elected as lead director for the nine independent directors in the company's 11-member board, the company said.
Stone & Webster provides engineering, construction and consulting services.
Smith, 53, formerly served as managing director of Deutsche Babcock AG, an international engineering and equipment concern, and as president and the German company's North American holding company.
He also served as chairman, president and chief executive of Riley Consolidated, a power plants and enviromental control systems builder.
